snippet: Even as some party leaders urge them to concede, most rank-and-file House Republicans refuse for reasons that run deep in the structure of 21st-century American politics.
abstract: Even as some party leaders urge them to concede, most rank-and-file House Republicans refuse for reasons that run deep in the structure of 21st-century American politics.
lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON — To Democrats, Republican resistance to raising tax rates on affluent Americans seems not only stubborn, but also befuddling and self-defeating.
